field.label: Enable
field.help: This will activate the FreeRADIUS service.

field.label: Enable VLAN assignment
field.help: This allows you to dynamically assign VLANs on your physical switch ports.

field.label: Enable WISPr attributes
field.help: This enables the WISPr attributes assignment via users tab.

field.label: Enable ChilliSpot attributes
field.help: This enables the ChilliSpot attributes assignment via users tab.
